title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the integrand

1 point is earned for the limits

1 point is earned for the equation

ln x = 5-x ⇒ x = 3.69344

Therefore, the graphs of y=ln x and y=5-x intersect in the first quadrant at the point (A, B)=(3.69344, 1.30656).

∫ 0 K (5−y− e y )dy= 1 2 .2.986(or 1 2 .2.985) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5308@
